intro: This public analysis report explains the biggest gluten risks in Oyster Sauce and how to order more safely.

verdict.summary: Oyster sauce may contain gluten due to the use of wheat-based ingredients in its production. It's important to verify the specific ingredients and preparation methods to ensure safety for those with coeliac disease.

disclaimer: This guidance is informational only. Always verify ingredients and preparation with the restaurant.

sections.title: Common gluten risks
